description:
Add user names as nodes (without the @). Each user has a numeric ID as well. In case you work with the numeric ID switch the parameter "screen_name" to "user_id".

This preset gives you some basic information about the user. See the detail section and add new columns if you like.

See https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/accounts-and-users/follow-search-get-users/api-reference/get-users-show for information about parameters.
name: Get information about users
